title: A2A TaskArtifactUpdateEvent
description: TaskArtifactUpdateEvent represents a task delta where an artifact has been generated (A2A Specification Section 4.2.2).
notes: This schema is a 1:1 copy of A2A Protocol's TaskArtifactUpdateEvent structure. Used in StreamResponse for push notifications.

taskId.description: The id of the task for this artifact.

contextId.description: The id of the context that this task belongs to.

artifact.description: The artifact that was generated or updated.

append.description: If true, the content of this artifact should be appended to a previously sent artifact with the same ID.

lastChunk.description: If true, this is the final chunk of the artifact.

metadata.description: Optional metadata associated with the artifact update.
